node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `debatecomment` ( `debatecomment_id` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `parent_debatecomment` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `root_debatecomment` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `doctext` mediumtext, `restricted` int DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`debatecomment_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: debatecomment
